[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ background_color=”#2f3236″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(21,21,22,0.73)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(21,21,22,0.83)” background_color_gradient_direction=”360deg” background_color_gradient_start_position=”6%” background_image=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2019/04/hero3.jpg” background_position=”center_left” background_blend=”multiply” custom_padding=”0px||44px|||” bottom_divider_style=”slant” bottom_divider_color=”#fff” bottom_divider_flip=”horizontal” bottom_divider_height_tablet=”50px” bottom_divider_height_phone=”20px” bottom_divider_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”30px” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”100px” header_line_height=”0.95em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||20px|-7px” custom_margin_tablet=”||10px|0px” custom_margin_phone=”|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”|||0px” custom_padding_phone=”|||” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”450ms” animation_intensity_slide=”11%” header_font_size_tablet=”60px” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_line_height_tablet=”0.95em” header_line_height_phone=”1em” header_line_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_text_shadow_style=”preset3″ header_text_shadow_blur_strength=”1.1em” header_text_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)”]

The All-In-One
Sports Platform.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”25px” text_line_height=”1.4em” header_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||40px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||30px|” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|0px||0px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|0px||0px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”350ms” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” text_font_size_tablet=”20px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_text_shadow_style=”preset3″ text_text_shadow_blur_strength=”1.66em”]

With tools for team management, player development, communication, statistics, and analytics, 360Player is the most complete sports platform on the market today with everything you need in one place.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.360player.com/pricing-detect/” button_text=”Try free for 14 days!” button_alignment=”left” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#2f3236″ button_bg_color=”#ffe801″ button_border_color=”#ffe801″ button_letter_spacing=”-0.5px” button_font=”|700|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_padding=”12px|40px|12px|40px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”250ms” animation_delay=”400ms” animation_intensity_slide=”12%” custom_css_main_element=” ” button_border_color_hover=”#0b78e3″ button_bg_color_hover=”#0b78e3″ button_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_border_color__hover=”#ffe801″ button_one_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_bg_color__hover=”#ffe801″ button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off”] 
[/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

All features included. Cancel anytime.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/12/Multi-sport-all-in-one.png” alt=”Multi sport all in one” title_text=”Multi sport all in one” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22.7″ background_color=”#fff” custom_padding=”||4px||false|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”1382″ da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Trusted by clubs from all over the world.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/12/All-logos.png” alt=”Trusted by clubs from all over the world” title_text=”Trusted by clubs from all over the world” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#282c35″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

What’s inside 360Player?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||1px|||”]

Communication

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#bdc6cf” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.51em” link_text_color=”#ffe801″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcfc” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|30%||”]

360Player has a solution for every type of team and club communication. With messaging, group chats, performance reviews, and a live wall, everyone stays up to date and connected.

See more  →

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||1px|||”]

Team Management

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#bdc6cf” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.51em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcfc” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|30%||” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Easily plan upcoming practices, games, and team events for all to see. Track attendance, stats, and even attach training plans to events right in the app!

See more  →

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||1px|||”]

Session Planning

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#bdc6cf” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.51em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcfc” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|30%||”]

With our session planner tool you can save all of your favorite content in your own personalized library and plan your trainings in minutes.

See more  →

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.6″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||1px|||”]

Statistics

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#bdc6cf” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.51em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcfc” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|30%||”]

Create meaningful statistics from games and training sessions and get deep insights beyond just static numbers like scoring leaders, minutes played, physical strain, and much more.

See more  →

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||1px|||”]

Video Analytics

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#bdc6cf” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.51em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcfc” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|30%||”]

Gain a greater understanding of your team and help players improve through video analytics. 360Player’s video analytics tool is so easy that anyone can use it, regardless of prior experience.

See more  →

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||1px|||”]

Player Development

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#bdc6cf” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.51em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcfc” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|30%||”]

Make sure that every individual on the team has goals to work towards, gets the feedback they need, and takes responsibility for their own development with individualized development plans.

See more  →

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||align-items: flex-end;||”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

“360Player is an easy and modern platform for coaches and players in the team.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2019/09/Adam.png” title_text=”Adam” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”130px”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Adam Gürsoy

Coach
IFK Stocksund

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

“Staying updated and checking in with every player in every team has been a real challenge, but not anymore thanks to 360Player.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2019/09/Nacho.png” title_text=”Nacho” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”130px”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Nacho de Prada

Sports director and Owner
Racing Sárria C.F.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

“360Player enables communication, player development and exercising of good leadership, all in one easy to use mobile platform.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2019/09/Hasse.png” title_text=”Hasse” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”130px”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Hans Backe

Football expert and
coaching legend

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ background_color=”#ffffff” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_id=”get-started-form” _builder_version=”4.4.3″ custom_padding=”|150px||150px” custom_padding_tablet=”|0px||0px” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_width_px=”780px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text module_id=”contact-form” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#2f3236″ text_font_size=”18px” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#151516″ header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#151516″ header_2_font_size=”30px” custom_margin=”||50px|” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Get a free demo!

Want to get started using 360Player, or are you curious to find out more?
Fill in your details and a representative from 360Player will contact you as soon as possible.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
